query.name: Использование индексов
query.command: SELECT relid::regclass::text AS table, indexrelid::regclass::text AS index, pg_size_pretty(pg_relation_size(indexrelid::regclass)) AS index_size, idx_tup_read, idx_tup_fetch, idx_scan FROM pg_stat_user_indexes JOIN pg_index USING (indexrelid) WHERE --idx_scan = 0 --AND indisunique IS FALSE order by pg_relation_size(indexrelid::regclass) desc
